com.hazelcast.map.impl

Class LocalMapStatsProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.map.impl.LocalMapStatsProvider

  • public class LocalMapStatsProvider
extends Object
    Provides node local statistics of a map via createLocalMapStats(java.lang.String) and also holds all LocalMapStatsImpl implementations of all maps.

    • Nested Class Summary
